sentences.sContent: Olive dashed into the room, grabbed her bag, and ran out again.
sentences.sCn: 奥利芙冲进屋，抓起她的手提袋，又跑了出来。

phrases.pCn: v. 冲出，跑开；删去，勾掉

remMethod.val: d + ash(灰尘) → 群马飞奔而过， 扬起漫天灰尘 → 飞奔

words.tran: 时髦的，华丽的；雄纠纠的；劲头十足的

trans.tranCn: 飞奔，猛冲；猛掷；使破灭，使沮丧
trans.tranOther: to go or run somewhere very quickly

trans.tranCn: 飞奔， 猛冲； 破折号； 精力， 干劲
trans.tranOther: an occasion when someone runs somewhere very quickly in order to get away from something or someone, or in order to reach them
